text: The Single Guy is a NBC sitcom that aired from September 21, 1995 to April 14, 1997 for two seasons and 43 episodes. It stars Jonathan Silverman, Joey Slotnick, Mark Moses, Ernest Borgnine, Jessica Hecht, Shawn Michael Howard, Olivia d'Abo and J.E. Freeman. ==Other websites== * Category:1995 American television series debuts Category:1997 American television series endings Category:NBC network series
title: The Single Guy
